activities: We manage an online and offline database which hosts oil and gas workers' training certifications, demographic information, eLearning courses, as well as other information which the system users input to the database.  We use this information to provide users with their training information; complete users' purchases; create/modify user accounts; assist users with account problems or concerns; uphold contractual responsibilities for corporate accounts; perform internal data analysis; strategize marketing efforts; market products and services to users; and to improve our websites, products, and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data (end-user) as well as corporate data (for large enterprise contracts) - none is manually processed.
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU and/or Swiss data protection authorities.
